summary: Add a few masks and some armored hoods.
descriptionHtml:
This little mod will add a few masks and masked hoods. With the exception of the hoods, the masks uses the vanilla textures or any replacement you might be using. you\'ll need \"Dawnguard\" installed if you want to use \"Dawnguard Mask\" and \"Hooded Dawnguard Mask\".

The Daedric Mask and Iron Mask may look a little odd if you\'re using a bald character. Unfortunately the hoods may clip a little bit depending in what armor you\'re using, but they still look kinda cool in my opinion.

You\'ll need to craft them. Steel Masks needs \"Advanced Armors\" perk, Ebony Mask needs \"Ebony Smithing\"... Well, I think it goes without saying.
-------------------
INSTALL
-extract the \"data\" folder in this file to your skyrim directory (\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\).
-activate \"tioJuca-masks.esp\".
-------------------
UNINSTALL
-delete \"tioJuca-masks.esp\"
-go to \\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\meshes\\armor and delete the 
folder \"gabstuff_Masks\".
-go to \\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\textures and delete the folder 
\"jucamasks\".
-------------------
Hope you enjoy!
-------------------
CREDITS
SpartanXIII90 - for the hood meshes for the females.
TH3WICK3D1 - ported many assets from The Witcher to Skyrim.
author: Zemaria
